import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get CalDav link"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/calendar/{calendarId}/caldavurl"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a link to the CalDav related to the calendar with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"calendarId","in":"path","description":"Calendar ID","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"uri":{"description":"Current URI","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"CalDav link","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"Completed":{"type":"boolean"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"Data":{"type":"string"},"Error":{"type":"string"}},"title":"DavResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
